text: Odness is a peninsula and headland on the island of Stronsay, in Orkney, Scotland. The Odness peninsula contains the farm of Odiness. Odness is also within the parish of Stronsay. The coast near Odness ==References== ==External links== *Canmore - Rose III Steam Drifter site record, Odness *Canmore - God Odina Settlement site record, Odness *Canmore - Burnt Mound site record, Odiness Category:Villages in Orkney Category:Stronsay
title: Odness
